```{webr-r}

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r echo=FALSE}

read.csv("data/tx_model_top_25.csv") |>
  DT::datatable(class = "compact", 
                options = list(
                  searching = FALSE, 
                  lengthChange = FALSE, 
                  ordering = FALSE, 
                  info = FALSE, 
                  columnDefs = list(
                    list(targets = 0, visible = FALSE),
                    list(className = 'dt-left', targets = "_all")  # apply to all columns
                  )
                )) |> 
  DT::formatRound(columns = "age", digits = 0)

```
